com.att.aro.commonui

Class DataTableModel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • com.att.aro.commonui.DataTableModel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationEndPointSummaryTableModel, AsyncCheckTableModel, BurstAnalysisTableModel, BurstCollectionInfoTableModel, CacheAnalysisTableModel, DisplayNoneInCSSTableModel, DuplicateTableModel, ExpandedDomainTableModel, FileOrderTableModel, FilterApplicationsTableModel, FilterIpAddressesTableModel, FilterProcessesTableModel, Http4xx5xxStatusResponseCodesTableModel, HttpCode3XXTableModel, ImageSizeTableModel, IPEndPointSummaryTableModel, MinificationTableModel, PacketInfoTableModel, RequestResponseTableModel, SimpleDomainTableModel, SpriteImageTableModel, TCPFlowsTableModel, TextFileCompressionTableModel

    public abstract class DataTableModel<T>
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    Represents a base implementation for a table model that is used to display data in JTables. The DataTableModel class manages its table data as a collection of generic objects whose type is defined when the class is used.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getData

        public java.util.List<T> getData()
        Returns the data contained in the table as a list that cannot be modified. The list returned by this method is made un-modifiable to prevent inadvertent changes to the data in the table.
        Returns:
        The data contained in the table as a Returns the data java.util.List that cannot be modified.

      • createDefaultTableColumnModel

        public javax.swing.table.TableColumnModel createDefaultTableColumnModel()
        Returns a TableColumnModeltable column model that is based on the default table column model for the DataTableModel class. The TableColumnModelcolumn model returned by this method has the same number of columns in the same order and structure as the table column model in the DataTableModel. When a DataTable object is created, this method is used to create the TableColumnModel if one is not specified. This method may be overridden in order to provide customizations to the default column model, such as providing a default column width and/or adding column renderers and/ editors.
        Returns:
        The TableColumnModel object.

      • getColumnValue

        protected abstract java.lang.Object getColumnValue(T item,
                              int columnIndex)
        Defines how the data object managed by this table model is mapped to its columns when displayed in a row of the table. The getValueAt() method uses this method to retrieve table cell data. Note: This method must be implemented by subclasses.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to retrieve the value for.
        columnIndex - The index of the column.
        Returns:
        The table column value calculated for the object
